com.fluidops.iwb.api.editor
Interface TripleEditorSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
TripleEditorSourceBNodeImpl, TripleEditorSourceLiteralImpl, TripleEditorSourceLoadAtOnceBase, TripleEditorSourceURIImpl, TripleEditorSourceURIOnDemand
public interface TripleEditorSource

Interface that models data source for the Triple editor.

uli

Field Detail

ALL_STATEMENTS

static final int ALL_STATEMENTS
Integer representing the LIMIT to retrieve all statements for a given property, see getStatementsForProperty

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getStatementPreview

java.util.List<TripleEditorStatement> getStatementPreview()
                                                          throws org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
Return a list of statements which are associated to the given resource or label. Depending on the implementation this can include outgoing and/or incoming statements. This method is designed to return a preview of statements (i.e., it is not required to be complete for the given resource). However, it is guaranteed that each property is present in at least one statement, i.e. the list of properties is complete.

Returns:
Throws:
org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException

getStatementsForProperty

java.util.List<TripleEditorStatement> getStatementsForProperty(TripleEditorPropertyInfo tepi,
                                                               int offset,
                                                               int limit)
                                                               throws org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
Returns a list of statements for the given property matching the offset and limit settings. The method returns a list with at most limit, however, the list can also be empty if there are no statements matching the properties. If limit equals ALL_STATEMENTS, the entire set of statements for the given property is to be returned.

Parameters:
tepi -
offset -
limit -
Returns:
Throws:
org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException

getPropertyInfos

java.util.Set<TripleEditorPropertyInfo> getPropertyInfos()
                                                         throws org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
Returns the complete set of all available property information for the given resource.

Returns:
Throws:
org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
